description:
The Kamoto is way beyond a circle of rocks. Raise your fire up off the ground to protect the ground from getting charred. Strategically placed vents let air in, while ash falls through the bottom onto the ashtray.

  • Constructed from rugged stainless and powder-coated steel
  • Air intakes aide in combustion
  • Serrated edges help keep logs in place, or marshmallow roasting sticks from rolling away
  • Included grill grate for easy cooking
  • Folds down for easy transport
  • Accommodates up 40cm logs
name: Primus Kamoto OpenFire Pit Large
